text: Ram Baran Yadav (born 4 February 1948) is a Nepalese politician and physician. He was the 1st President of Nepal following the declaration of a republic in 2008. He was president from 23 July 2008 to 29 October 2015. Yadav was Minister of State for Health in the 1991-1994 Nepali Congress government. He was elected to the House of Representatives in 1999.Election Commission of Nepal ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Nepal Category:Nepalese Hindus
title: Ram Baran Yadav
